text: K2-72b is a small exoplanet orbiting around the red dwarf star K2-72 approximately 227.7 light-years away. K2-72b completes an orbit in 5.57 days, and it has a radius of only 75% of that of the Earth. ==References== Category:Exoplanets discovered in 2016 Category:Transiting exoplanets 72 Category:Aquarius (constellation)
title: K2-72b
